member.name: IDxcExtraOutputs.GetOutput
member.param: The index of the output to retrieve
The interface ID of the output interface.
The optiopnal address of the pointer that receives a pointer to the output, if there is one.
The optional address of the pointer to receive the output type name blob, if there is one.
The optional address of a pointer to receive the output name blob, if there is one.

member.name: IDxcExtraOutputs.GetOutputCount
member.summary: Retrieves the number of outputs available.

summary.para: Represents additional outputs from a DXC operation.
This can be used to obtain outputs that don't have an explicit DXC_OUT_KIND. Use DXC_OUT_EXTRA_OUTPUTS to obtain instances of this.
